name: Gyroom
description:
You found... a place. It was through a door. You know you should head back out that door. Nothing good could be up ahead. Still... what could lie up ahead?

Controls
  • WASD / Arrow Keys / Controller D-Pad
  • W / Up-Arrow acts as a USE key in some contexts (doors and rotation platforms)
  • Space / A to jumo
  • While a controller can be used, it was only seriously tested on a keyboard.

- To use these platforms, hold W / Up-Arrow and press either left or right!

---

Gyroom was created in less than 48 hours for the Kenney Jam 2021
All graphic resources were from Kenney (as was the point of the jam)

The game was made on the Godot 3.3.2 Engine
